name: user-card.toml

component.name: User Card
component.description: Displays user information in a card format with avatar, name, email, role badge and actions

rawContent:
[component]
id = "user-card"
name = "User Card"
description = "Displays user information in a card format with avatar, name, email, role badge and actions"

[component.props]
user = "UserEntity"
onDelete = "(id: string) => void"

[component.features]
list = [
  "User avatar display",
  "Name and email",
  "Role badge (admin/user)",
  "Join date",
  "Delete action on hover"
]

[component.styling]
hover = "shadow-lg transition"
responsive = true

[relations]
entities = ["user"]
pages = ["users"]

[implementation]
component = "UserCard"
file = "core/app/src/pages/prototype/UsersPage.tsx"
preview = "/prototype/users"
status = "implemented"
